summary: This document appears to be a transcript of a deposition or interview where a correctional officer named Ms. Noel is being questioned. The interviewer asks about her employment history with the Bureau of Prisons (BOP), her supervisor, and her contact information, specifically referencing the year 2019.

persons.name: Ms. Noel
persons.context: A correctional officer being interviewed about her employment with the Bureau of Prisons, including her supervisor and contact information.

events.title: Reference to year 2019 in questioning
events.description: The interviewer asks the witness if her contact phone number was the same to include in 2019, indicating relevance of that time period.

keyFacts: Ms. Noel was a correctional officer with the Bureau of Prisons (BOP).
Her direct supervisor was a Lieutenant, whose last name was requested for spelling.
The interviewer confirmed they would not contact her client, suggesting legal representation or a separate matter.
The questioning specifically references whether her contact information was the same in 2019, tying the inquiry to that year.
